alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Palm Beach County through 445 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near South Bay to 6 miles west of Lion Country Safari Park to near North County Airport. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Beach Gardens, Belle Glade, Pahokee, South Bay, Canal Point, Lake Harbor, Okeelanta, Belle Glade Camp, Lion Country Safari Park, Fremd Village-Padgett Island, The Acreage and Caloosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
